flavorText: "It seems there's even better hunting down here."

foreignData.flavorText: „Anscheinend kann man hier unten sogar noch besser jagen."
foreignData.name: Präzise Harpunenschützin
foreignData.text: Rebellion — Wenn die Präzise Harpunenschützin ins Spiel kommt und falls in diesem Zug eine bleibende Karte unter deiner Kontrolle das Spiel verlassen hat, zerstöre eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert.

foreignData.flavorText: "Las presas son incluso mejores aquí abajo".
foreignData.name: Arponeadora ojo de halcón
foreignData.text: Revuelta — Cuando la Arponeadora ojo de halcón entre al campo de batalla, si un permanente que controlabas dejó el campo de batalla este turno, destruye la criatura girada objetivo que controla un oponente.

foreignData.flavorText: « Voilà un bien meilleur terrain de chasse. »
foreignData.name: Harponneuse d'élite
foreignData.text: Révolte — Quand la Harponneuse d'élite arrive sur le champ de bataille, si un permanent que vous contrôliez a quitté le champ de bataille ce tour-ci, détruisez une créature engagée ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sembra che quaggiù la caccia sia persino migliore."
foreignData.name: Fiociniera Infallibile
foreignData.text: Rivolta — Quando la Fiociniera Infallibile entra nel campo di battaglia, se un permanente che controllavi ha lasciato il campo di battaglia in questo turno, distruggi una creatura TAPpata bersaglio controllata da un avversario.

foreignData.flavorText: 「この辺りではいい狩りができそうだ。」
foreignData.name: 銛撃ちの名手
foreignData.text: 紛争 ― 銛撃ちの名手が戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがコントロールするパーマネントが戦場を離れていた場合、対戦相手がコントロールするタップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドワーフ・戦士

foreignData.name: 예리한 작살 사냥꾼
foreignData.text: 봉기 — 예리한 작살 사냥꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종한 지속물이 이 턴에 전장을 떠났다면, 상대가 조종하는 탭된 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Parece que há caça ainda melhor aqui embaixo."
foreignData.name: Arpoadora Certeira
foreignData.text: Revolta — Quando Arpoadora Certeira entrar no campo de batalha, se uma permanente que você controlava deixou o campo de batalha neste turno, destrua a criatura virada alvo que um oponente controla.

foreignData.name: Меткая Гарпунщица
foreignData.text: Бунт — Когда Меткая Гарпунщица выходит на поле битвы, если находившийся под вашим контролем перманент покинул поле битвы в этом ходу, уничтожьте целевое повернутое существо под контролем оппонента.

foreignData.name: 神准鱼叉手
foreignData.text: 反抗～当神准鱼叉手进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则消灭目标由对手操控且已横置的生物。

foreignData.name: 神準魚叉手
foreignData.text: 反抗～當神準魚叉手進戰場時，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物離開戰場，則消滅目標由對手操控且已橫置的生物。

name: Deadeye Harpooner
originalText: Revolt — When Deadeye Harpooner enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.

rulings.text: Revolt abilities check only whether a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn or not. They don’t apply multiple times if more than one permanent you controlled left the battlefield. They don’t check whether the permanent that left the battlefield is still in the zone it moved to.

Revolt abilities don’t care why the permanent left the battlefield, who caused it to move, or where it moved to. They’re equally satisfied by an artifact you sacrificed to pay a cost, a creature you controlled that was destroyed by Murder, or an enchantment you returned to your hand with Leave in the Dust.
Tokens that leave the battlefield will satisfy a revolt ability.
Energy counters aren’t permanents. Paying {E} won’t satisfy a revolt ability.

All cards in the Aether Revolt set with triggered revolt abilities use an intervening “if” clause. A permanent you controlled must have left the battlefield earlier in the turn in order for these abilities to trigger; otherwise they do nothing. In other words, there’s no way to have the ability trigger if no permanent you controlled has left the battlefield that turn, even if you intend to have one do so in response to the triggered ability.

text: Revolt — When Deadeye Harpooner enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.
